attributes.action: REDIRECT SOCIAL SERVICES RESOURCES AWAY FROM YOUNG OFFENDERS TOWARDS DISABLED CHILDREN.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to ask the Prime Minister why Local Authority social service departments pay between £3000 -£4500 PER-WEEK to private care-homes to accomodate sex-offenders under the age of 19 when parents of disabled children who are desperate for support recieve a few hours respite care costing about £50 per week if they are lucky or more often than not nothing at all Why is that? Who makes these decisions and how can they justify it? Why is tax-payers money allocated so unfairly?
